about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Jericho covert ops interceptor Kusarigama. Rank 16
  • Shrapnel cannon “Punisher”
  • Active module “Plasma Ram”
  • Unique character portrait “Celia Casado”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Coating “Branches”
  • Decor “Deceptive rhombus”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Adaptive camo
  • Quantum defence
  • Hull restoration system
  • “Orion” targeting complex
  • Vernier engines
  • Emergency barrier
  • Pulse discharger
  • Adaptive shield
  • Multipurpose shield
  • Crystal plates
  • “Proton wall”
  • Infrared scanner


Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

Kusarigama is the newest cover ops ship of the Liu family that was built at the Crystal shipyard. Rumour has it that the technologies from the Temple of Last Hope were used in its creation, although this hasn’t been confirmed. Due to the production limitations, the interceptors are produced one at a time, and for specific tasks that are unknown to anyone. Occasionally this AI-controlled ship can often be encountered in the Jericho sectors.

One of the Kusarigama’s main advantages is the Avionics-K onboard electronic complex, designed specifically for the new interceptor. In many ways, it is because of this system that the ship has great efficiency. The shrapnel kinetic weapon, common for Jericho ships, has been significantly redesigned and enhanced, and the active and special modules allow the pilot to destroy the full range of possible targets.

So far, neither the Sentinels nor the Mendes family have been able to obtain the blueprints of Kusarigama for further research and production. According to the Liu Family, in the future it is planned to supply the UMC with a weakened version of the Kusarigama for testing by mercenaries.

name: Star Conflict - Kusarigama (Deluxe Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
